text.title: Fiue hundred pointes of good husbandrie : as well for the champion, or open countrie, as also for the woodland, or seuerall, mixed in eurie month with huswiferie, ouer and besides the booke of huswiferie, corrected, better ordered, and newly augmented to a fourth part more, with diuers other lessons, as a diet for the fermer ... : also a table of husbandrie ... and another of huswiferie ... for the better and easier finding of any matter conteined in the same / newly set forth by Thomas Tusser ...

bibliography.title: Fiue hundred pointes of good husbandrie : as well for the champion, or open countrie, as also for the woodland, or seuerall, mixed in eurie month with huswiferie, ouer and besides the booke of huswiferie, corrected, better ordered, and newly augmented to a fourth part more, with diuers other lessons, as a diet for the fermer ... : also a table of husbandrie ... and another of huswiferie ... for the better and easier finding of any matter conteined in the same / newly set forth by Thomas Tusser ...
bibliography.commonName: Thomas Tusser, Pointes of good husbandrie (London, 1580)
